name: Add date of joining field in student registration page
description: Add date of joining field in student registration page
llmTaskExplanation: Add a 'date of joining' field to the student registration page using a material design library. This involves updating the frontend form to include a new date input field with the format dd/MM/yyyy and ensuring that the backend can handle this new data field appropriately.
validations: The 'date of joining' field should accept valid date formats (dd/MM/yyyy).
The field should not accept future dates.
The field should be optional for now, but should validate if provided.
Ensure the date is not before a reasonable past limit (e.g., 1900-01-01).
unitTests: Test that the 'date of joining' field accepts a valid date format (dd/MM/yyyy).
Test that the field rejects future dates.
Test that the field accepts an empty value (optional field).
Test that the field rejects dates before 1900-01-01.
acceptanceCriteria: Given the student registration page, when a user views the form, then they should see a 'date of joining' field.
When a user enters a valid date in dd/MM/yyyy format, the form should accept it.
When a user enters a future date, the form should display an error message.
When a user submits the form without a date, it should still submit successfully.
technicalDependencies: Use existing date handling libraries or components if available in the project.
Use a material design library for the date input field.
security: Sanitize the date input to prevent injection attacks.
performance: Ensure the addition of the date field does not significantly impact form load times.
businessContext: The 'date of joining' field is likely used for administrative purposes to track when a student officially joins the institution.
otherNotes: Consider adding a tooltip or help text to guide users on the expected date format.

llmAssumptions.assumption: The tech stack includes a frontend framework capable of handling form inputs, such as React or Angular.
The backend is capable of storing date fields, likely in a database.
There is an existing form validation mechanism that can be extended.
Frontend is Next.js, backend is Node.js.

inScope: Adding a 'date of joining' field to the student registration form.
Updating form validation to include the new field.
outOfScope: Modifying any other parts of the student registration process.
Implementing backend logic unrelated to storing the 'date of joining'.

suggestedFileChanges.rationale: To add the 'date of joining' field to the form using a material design library.
To update the student model to include the 'date of joining' field.

promptForAider: Add a 'date of joining' field to the student registration page using a material design library.
